songs.title: Purana Wala
songs.lyrics:
[Hook : Bohemia ]
Ajje vi mausam lage toofana wala
Ve jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Ajje vi yaad aaye suhaana oh zamana
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala

[Verse 1 : Bohemia]
Ajj kal munde hip hop de naa te pande khap khana
Mere puraane rap agge pitte nawa har gaana
Methon likhariyan di bajjti nahi dekhi jandi
Hun main nave rap nayi banauna
Ajj kal munde rap karan ghat
Pande shor kinna
Naale rang berange kapdeyan
Te lande zor kinna
Raja 10 saal ton Punjabi rap da Badshah
Daadi chitti hogi
Vairiyan da wait karaan hor kinna
Hor kehda likh sakda ve aidan di cheez
Likhaari lagde mere agge dimaagi mareez
Ve mera kalam dole aini ilam geet jiven chale film
Blueprint nakshe banawan loki amal karan
Gaane nave nave jehde bekaar bol jehde
Lokan nu kar dende bezaar bol jehde
TV te radio te lagataar wajjan
Par log ajje vi meri pehli CD kadd kehnde

[Hook : Bohemia]
Ajje vi mausam lage toofana wala
Ve jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Ajje vi yaad aaye suhaana oh zamana
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala

[Verse 2 : J Hind]
Allow me re-introduce my breed!
Ten years runnin’ game plan plots strategies
Still the same Hindustani with the same my bro
Ridin’ with the same Punjabi in a damp exchange
They say the revolution will never be on TV
Inquilab Zindabaad CD after CD
10 saal baad still rollin’ with my bhai
Call it all muqabla so it be called meri pride
Well in the dunali catchin’ first class flight
20 T’s for a show that was last year’s price
New rappers may emerge on the scene everyday
But they will never be another Bohemia & J
Still! runnin’ the frame of the plastic clocks
Still! runnin’ the train on his basted cast
Still! LA to Oakland all day long
It seems like everywhere I go they still bumpin’ my song

[Hook: Bohemia]
Ajje vi mausam lage toofana wala
Ve jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Ajje vi yaad aaye suhaana oh zamana
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
Jadon vajje mera rap purana wala
